issue.title: [Python] decryption_properties missing in pyarrow.parquet.ParquetDataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17285](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17285). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Unlike pyarrow.parquet.ParquetFile, afaik ParquetDataset does not seem to support decryption (missing decryption_properties). Would it be possible to add it or document how to supply decryption?

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17285?focusedCommentId=17574321) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
This is a duplicate of ARROW-13593.
